pageContext.claim: “These people make it up. "Washington Post", that's basically the lobbyist for Amazon. You know, he uses that -- Bezos has got bigger problems than anybody right now. But Bezos uses that as his lobbyist, OK, as far as I'm concerned.”
pageContext.analysis: The Washington Post is owned by Jeffrey P. Bezos, who also, separately, owns Amazon. The Post does not lobby on behalf of Amazon or cover the web giant differently than it covers Apple or Google.
